amendment.description: To reduce the amount appropriated for reconstruction in Iraq by $600,000,000 and to increase the amount available to the Iraqi Civil Defense Corps by $50,000,000, the amount available for Afghanistan by $400,000,000, and the amount available for Liberia.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1885 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 43. Record Vote Number: 399.

Amendment SA 1885 proposed by Senator Brownback. (consideration: CR S12799-12803; text as modified: CR S12799) To reduce the amount appropriated for reconstruction in Iraq by $600,000,000 and to increase the amount available to the Iraqi Civil Defense Corps by $50,000,000, the amount available for Afghanistan by $400,000,000, and the amount available for Liberia.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1885 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 43. Record Vote Number: 399.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1885 proposed by Senator Brownback.
